fields.request: Validate authenticator password gate on login
fields.request_details: Use the TOTP Device admin page (Security > Authenticator devices) to edit an enrolled authenticator. First leave "Allow without a password" unchecked and confirm the login page's Authenticator flow shows the username pre-check and then prompts for both password and code. Next, enable "Allow without a password" on the same device, refresh the login page, and verify the Authenticator flow skips the password field after the pre-check so only the six-digit code is required. Document any regressions in the new interstitial step or checkbox handling.
